By thus pouring the whole treasury of heaven into this world, by giving us in Christ all heaven itself, God purchased human affection and human ability. By yielding our minds to him, they will be cleansed from all selfishness and covetousness, and filled with unselfish love. 
                                                                           1581
The Lord directs every mind that will be captivated by his love, and reveals to it the mystery of godliness.
